DataElement.preferredName: First Acute Graft Versus Host Disease Maximum Overall Grade Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The month, day, and year of the first maximum overall grade of acute graft versus host disease.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: First Acute Graft Versus Host Disease Maximum Overall Grade
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree._A syndrome of immunologically mediated tissue damage that may occur following an allogeneic transplant, usually affecting the skin, liver, and GI tract. The onset is usually within one hundred days of transplantation or immunologic manipulation._the largest possible quantity or degree._Including everything._A position on a scale of intensity or amount or quality.

ObjectClass.preferredName: First Acute Graft Versus Host Disease
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:A syndrome of immunologically mediated tissue damage that may occur following an allogeneic transplant, usually affecting the skin, liver, and GI tract. The onset is usually within one hundred days of transplantation or immunologic manipulation.

Concepts.definition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.

A syndrome of immunologically mediated tissue damage that may occur following an allogeneic transplant, usually affecting the skin, liver, and GI tract. The onset is usually within one hundred days of transplantation or immunologic manipulation.

Property.preferredDefinition: the largest possible quantity or degree.:Including everything.:A position on a scale of intensity or amount or quality.

Concepts.definition: The largest possible quantity or degree.
A position on a scale of intensity or amount or quality.
